thread.section_title: Fresh Start Law Center Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fresh Start Law Center | freshstartlawcenter.com
thread.title: Ron M.
thread.title_full: Fresh Start Law Center reviewed by Ron M.

author: Ron M.
title: Ron M.
text: I decided to work with Atty. David Huffman and Fresh Start Law Center because of his no nonsense simplified approach to my DUI case. The process was not easy breezy but he is true to his word and he delivers to what I was hoping for. I truly can say I made a good investment with Atty. David Huffman and Fresh Start Law Center. I would certainly promote their legal services to my friends and family ! In fact I am getting his legal services again soon !
